channel.title: Marketing Strategy on Budibase - A Better Way To Build SaaS Applications

item.title: 5 tips for your next marketing strategy
item.description: It’s Christmas, you should be relaxing, drinking wine, farting out loud with that ‘I don’t give a feck attitude’! And rightly so! But what happens when January comes? Are you prepared for 2018? Or are you clawing on to your Americano with desperation? Well, you can relax, your 3rd favourite Irish Marketer has got your back. In January you can skip into your office like a marketing martyr who’s recently read 50 shades of Seth Godin.
